record.description: Six University of Chicago students, the most prominent undergraduates on the Midway, will lead the three wings of the 32nd annual Washington Promenade Friday night, February 21, at the Lake Shore Athletic Club. First row, left to right: Barbara Vail (Mirror president, Women's Revue); Jeanne Stolte (Daily Maroon Woman's Editor); and Cynthia Grabo (Y. W. C. A President); second row: Robert Ebert (Dramatic Association President, Rhodes Scholar, elect); Jay Berwanger (Senior Class President, Football Captain); and Ralph Nicholson (Daily Maroon Editor).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: University of Chicago Magazine stamp on duplicate copy.
